artist: Artist: Joseph Miller; Publisher: Joseph Miller

description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of figure in cityscape with text printed in red and black-and-white offset lithography on wove paper covers; 32 pp.

title: One Day Back, no. 1
